12.title: So this is completely permanent? | Kiwi Farms

messages.content: Is this forum still able to be TOS'ed?
This IS a permanent forum. I don't think it's under forumer so I don't think it will get TOS'd.

It's hosted by the same provider as the CWCki itself, so there's no risk of them taking it offline.
We have full control of the site down to the source code, including the terms of service, so if the site is breaking any rules, we can just change them.
The difference really is that we aren't using a forum provider, but are instead just using phpBB software on our own website (actually Null's website (thanks again), but still).

The only thing you have to worry about is dreamhost. As an admin(n0chan) dealing with an unresponsive host. The worst case scenario would be them taking a back up of the forum and finding another host.
I hate to sound like an idiot, but what exactly does TOS'd mean.

darkhorse816 said:
			
		


			I hate to sound like an idiot, but what exactly does TOS'd mean.
		
Click to expand...


Terms Of Service.

As in reporting the forum for violating the Terms Of Service.

Alan Pardew said:
			
		


			Terms Of Service.

As in reporting the forum for violating the Terms Of Service.
		
Click to expand...


Ah... that's what I thought.

Basically, when you sign up for a Forumer.com forum, you agree that they can take your forum down at any time for any reason (or for no reason at all). It's easy to misinterpret the cwcki forums as a cult trying to stalk Chris. It doesn't help that Ofos or whomever it was trying to shut down the forums previously likely made up trolling schemes and told them we were some hacktivist group.

That's not going to be a problem. I pay Dreamhost for their hosting service, they want my business, and because they're not the actual content provider (e.g. I'm more likely to be held liable than Dreamhost, as opposed to Forumer.com) there should be no such issue here.
Thanks, Null!

Alan Pardew said:
			
		


			Terms Of Service.

As in reporting the forum for violating the Terms Of Service.
		
Click to expand...


Also phonetically it kind of sounds like "tossing overboard" when a forum is TOSed.  

Although that may just be me.
For some reason I noticed the resemblance to "tossing" but didn't think of "tossing overboard", instead I thought "TOSer" sounds like "tosser" as in "don't TOS us, you tosser!".

Thank you for doing this Null. Now we have a place to discuss CWC free from fear of the Forumer stormtroopers coming after us (those billyclubs really hurt). 

Seriously, it's a great thing to do this. I'd thank you more if I wasn't so drunk.
Thanks, Null!  It feels much better posting on a forum knowing that it's going to be around for a good long while.
This is the third time I've had to re-register...I hope it is the last
Let's hope this incarnation is more permanent than the last ones.

Major Update said:
			
		


			Let's hope this incarnation is more permanent than the last ones.
		
Click to expand...

That's probably what Chris kept thinking every time a sweetheart appeared.
I'm glad that we don't have the Forumer staff bossing us about now.
It's about damn time...I'm getting tired of losing lulzy topics because of TOS'ing.

10.title: The General forum rules | Kiwi Farms

messages.content:
I'm taking a big leap by having a General forum here. But the demand is there so I allow it. A few basic rules though:

1) Keep your sperging to a minimum

If you like something, that's fine. But don't sperg out and tell us how you obsess over some children's cartoon or you write fanfiction where you rape some TV show character, that sort of thing. For the love of God, if you have any particular sexual fetishes or anything like that, DON'T SHARE THEM WITH US. 

2) Be careful about personal information

This forum sometimes attracts unsavory characters so be careful posting stuff like your real name, where you live and work, contact information tied with your real name, etc. This is for your safety.

If anything else needs to be addressed, I'll update this post.

champthom said:
			
		


			1) Keep your sperging to a minimum

If you like something, that's fine. But don't sperg out and tell us how you obsess over some children's cartoon or you write fanfiction where you rape some TV show character, that sort of thing. For the love of God, if you have any particular sexual fetishes or anything like that, DON'T SHARE THEM WITH US.
		
Click to expand...


I've been noticing a trend where people are being a little more...open about their preferences.

Guys, it's cool that you feel comfortable enough to share things here, but on the whole try to keep it clean. If you wanna discuss your orientation and the like, cool, whatever helps you relate to each other, but  the things you find fap worthy do not need to be discussed. Not everyone likes to read that so be considerate. I don't think it will, but I'm gonna be watchdoggin' if it gets out of hand.

It's funny how despite being 12 years old these rules still hold up.
Apologies for the negrobump doe

This is a rule that applies to every forum here. I shouldn't really need to spell it out but I want to make it clear. It's:

1) Respect one another and be civil.

You might not agree with everyone all the time, someone might rub you the wrong way, doesn't mean you need to be a dick about it. If they're bothering you, bring it up to a mod or admin. 

Don't call people names, don't libel people, that sort of shit. It's common sense really but I think I should spell it out. I think I also need to spell it out here because we sometimes attract would be trolls. This isn't 4chan or /cwc/, I won't tolerate people calling other people "fags" or other shit that might fly on a board like /b/. 

2) Save the drama for your mama

Don't start drama and shit on here, we don't need it. If you get personally involved with another forum, and shit is happening between you and them, don't bring it onto the forum. We should all be adults here, we don't need childish shit like that going on.

That's about all I can think of for now and if I come up with other universal rules, I will update this thread.

1.title: Welcome to the new Permanent CWCki Forums | Kiwi Farms

messages.content:
Hey all,

This community, that I've only recently come across, is the most mature and civil group of people that isn't outright banal. You guys are a constant source of intellectual amusement, with each of you coming to every conversation with a unique point of view and theory. It's for that reason I've volunteered to support the forum with an true and honest domain name and an actual host that isn't going to trash our happy home just because of whom it is centered around.

Here's what the change means:

The forums are now running on a pure form of the PHPBB3 software suite, so I can change anything. I'm a programmer by employment and by hobby, so anything we may need tweaked or installed to suit our needs can be done.
Dreamhost is now the provider of hosting services, and they will not chop down our Internet unless we violate International or United States law.
All settings, users, and posts in the previous forum(s) have been lost forever. Sorry.

Champthom is the Super Administrator and the Community Manager. He has complete control over the content of the forum and its users. I've given him the task of setting up the boards and promoting the right people into Administrative and Moderator roles, and also ensuring that Hulk Hogan be given his proper yellow title (as he is a True American).



			
				champthom said:
			
		


			For the record, anyone who was banned that I remember WILL be banned on sight here.
		
Click to expand...



I've said my piece and I will be stepping back from this point. I do not wish to become the Supreme Glorious Leader of the board and its users, and I'd like to see the current administration continue on in their role. I will not be participating in community management, merely maintaining the boards and making sure that everyone gets a chance to discuss Chris without worry of another shut down. I like you guys, and I want to see this group carry on for a long time.

Feel free to use this thread to celebrate, make software requests, or do whatever.

Null said:
			
		


			ensuring that Hulk Hogan be given his proper yellow title (as he is a True American).
		
Click to expand...


This is the top priority.

Thank you, Null. You are a True and Honest American as well.
Sonichu Mod Dunsparce, reporting for duty.

For the record, anyone who was banned that I remember WILL be banned on sight here. These include (but not limited to):

-jcrowley
-Slimz
-KEngel
-PDK
-Anthrillca/A-Log
-Ofos
-the people involved in the recent drama (Chit, Blue, etc.)

If the staff sees you and remembers you were banned, then you WILL be banned. Otherwise, if you're a jackoff who I or the rest of the staff don't remember and you keep your nose clean, you can stay here.
In regards to that, props to Rusty for not ever ban evading (unlike just about everyone else).

Hey guys! It's great to be here on the new forum.

Hopefully there won't be any more drama. For a while, it was like high school all over again.
Feels like....Home.
Great to see the new permanent forum.

Compy, is your avatar Peter from The Room?

The suspense is killing me. I feel like I'm sitting on an atomic bomb, waiting for it to explode.
That's nice. Now gimmie mod.

darkhorse816 said:
			
		


			Compy, is your avatar Peter from The Room?

The suspense is killing me. I feel like I'm sitting on an atomic bomb, waiting for it to explode.
		
Click to expand...


Oh hi darkhorse816.

Alan Pardew said:
			
		


			Oh hi darkhorse816. 

Click to expand...


Let's go eat, huh?

Oh hai folks. Stratowhammy has arrived.

If Chris-chan himself registers, will he be banned? Just curious.
I'm back, sweeties.

Hi! I'm pinkyucat! I have been reading the CWCki for a while and I finally decided to register for these forums starting with the last one, I hope these really are permanent this time. I would have joined sooner, but all the other times I tried it said the forums were removed and redirected me to a hip-hop website.
Hooray, we're permanent again! I wasn't active much on the temp boards because they kept getting moved. This is awesome. Just have to go find a new avatar now.

Ace_Reloaded said:
			
		


			Hooray, we're permanent again! I wasn't active much on the temp boards because they kept getting moved. This is awesome. Just have to go find a new avatar now.
		
Click to expand...

Yep. No more, "MY ACCOUNT GOT DELETED 4 NO RESON CURSE U CWCKI FROUMS," ever again.

EDIT: Also, the search function works here. Today's a momentous day for the CWCki forums.
Thanks, Null!  Good to be back on solid ground.
It's good to have a permanent home again!  Thanks to everyone involved.
Snowkitten91 here! I'm glad that we have finally found a stable home.

17.title: What has Chris-chan Ruined For You? | Kiwi Farms

messages.content:
Through some form or another, Chris-chan has almost certainly ruined at least one thing for all of us.

For me: 

Ford Escorts. Where I currently live, I see MANY trashed 1990s Escorts, and think "Son-Chu!" EVERY TIME I see one. Even the European RS Cosworth Escort at the exotic car mechanic downtown makes me think of Chris and his car.

Orange Fanta

Virginia

Most fast food

Video games

Long Island Iced Tea

Sailor Moon

Family Guy

Sonic Drive-In

The names "Julie", "Ivy", "Chloe" and "Barbara".
Nothing for me. Ironically Chris makes something I like more interesting.

Alan Pardew said:
			
		


			Nothing for me. Ironically Chris makes something I like more interesting.
		
Click to expand...

Same. My opinion of Sonic was already low enough when I found him, and I still enjoyed it when I was 14. Although like Strato said, I can't help but giggle when I see those Ford Escorts.

Only Fanta has been truly ruined by Chris.  I always preferred the Mexican brand Jarritos' tangerine, but I wouldn't say no to a Fanta until that video.  Most of the items on Stratochu's list do all make me snort or roll my eyes, due to their connection with Chris.  Sonic was already ruined by many of the worse fantards.  Chris is actually one of the more tame fans out there.

I also can't even see the Fanta button on the soda machine at the clubhouse here without thinking about Chris-chan drinking his navy. 

Once the Coke man comes and refills the machine, I will try Fanta again, straight Fanta with nothing in it.

GFYS said:
			
		


			Only Fanta has been truly ruined by Chris.  I always preferred the Mexican brand Jarritos' tangerine, but I wouldn't say no to a Fanta until that video.  Most of the items on Stratochu's list do all make me snort or roll my eyes, due to their connection with Chris.  Sonic was already ruined by many of the worse fantards.  Chris is actually one of the more tame fans out there.
		
Click to expand...

Dude, I love Jarritos.






My favorites are the orange (of course) and the fruit punch, and I have a soft spot for guava in general, but I've yet to see it for sale in any stores around here. I always wanted to try the tamarind flavor, but fruit punch always wins me over.

Also, this has to be the tenth time I bring up Mexican soda on these forums, lol.

Re: What has Our Pet Lolcow Ruined For You?

Living. I'd kill myself, but he ruined that too.

Jerk.

He hasn't "ruined" anything,there's just things that will forever remind me of him.

Sonic The Hedgehog and the Commonwealth of Virginia mostly.

			He hasn't "ruined" anything,there's just things that will forever remind me of him.

This. It's not really fun associating him with things I like, (my car is a model called the Sonic. I love my car. =( And get Chris out of my Yugioh and MLP fandoms!) but it doesn't ruin them.

That said, I love orange soda, and I'm really, really glad my brand of choice has always been Sunkist. I can't quite forget Fanta's association with Chris. At least he didn't defile my favorite brand.
